name: Recycled Skateboard Big Hoop Earrings
description: Each piece is hand produced with many color variations from subtle and sweet to loud and crazy. These earrings hang freely from sterling silver ear wires so they can spin around to reveal both sides. The original skateboard graphic covers the backside of these earrings along with the grind marks and scratches from the previous life of the skateboard. The front side of these earrings reveal the maple wood layers in the middle of the board with amazing color and tones. Save landfill space in style... Wear Maple XO.

options.name: Natural Wood Colored Front/ Skateboard Backside

name: Bangle
description: These lovely recycled skateboard bangles vary in style from bright and colorful, to sweet and subtle. Since almost all skateboards are made from 7-ply Maple Wood these bangles are super strong and durable, but delicate enough to rest sweetly around your wrist.

name: Small Hoops
description:
Each piece is handcrafted with many color variations from subtle and sweet to loud and crazy. These earrings hang freely from sterling silver ear wires so they can spin around to reveal both sides. Styles vary from edgy hoops, to rounded hoops, to wavy hoops. The original skateboard graphic covers the backside of these earrings along with the grind marks and scratches from the previous life of the skateboard. The front side of these earrings reveal the layers in the middle of the board with amazing color and tones.

Save landfill space in style and support the sport that stands for individuality.

Live.Love.Wear.Skateboarding.MapleXO

name: Disk Earrings
description:
Looking for some new style to add to your wardrobe? Then do yourself a favor and grab a pair of these Recycled Skateboard Disk Earrings. They're light weight, sanded as smooth as glass, and they hang about 3" from your ears. Ear wires and jump rings are sterling silver and you can choose to wear them 2 different ways. They will either show the natural wood side, or swap them in the opposite ears, and the original grind marks, designs, and scratches from the skateboard will be displayed.

Save Landfill Space in Style... Live. Love. Wear. Skateboarding...MapleXO Recycled Skateboard Jewelry

name: Triangle Earrings
description:
Looking for some new style to add to your wardrobe? Then do yourself a favor and grab a pair of these Recycled Skateboard Triangle Earrings. These popular polygons are a newest "best seller" from MapleXO. They're light weight, sanded as smooth as glass, and they hang about 3" from your ears. Ear wires and jump rings are sterling silver and you can choose to wear them 2 different ways. They will either show the natural wood side, or swap them in the opposite ears, and the original grind marks, designs, and scratches from the skateboard will be displayed.
Feel free to message us with your color preferences. You will love these earrings!

Live. Love. Wear. Skateboarding... MapleXO
